title: Will Smith Slaps Chris Rock!
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss the Final Four matchups. UNC-Duke has the makings to be one of the all-time greatest game, but do the guys feel the same about Villanova-Kansas? Might we see a blowout? LeBron James goes down with an ankle injury in a big loss to the Pelicans. Spurs sit one game behind LA looking to knock the Lakers out of the play-in. The guys tell you how likely that scenario is. And just wait until the guys dissect the slap heard around the world. What was Will Smith thinking and how did Chris Rock compose himself enough to present the award? All that and much more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
